column4: anyone know how to get a logitech quickcam messenger to work? pm me if u know how plz im trying to figure it out... but i get nothing.... im testing it out on skype.. it reads the camrea, but all i get is popcorn - blank like when u dont have the cable or sattelite hooked up to ur TV
you might need to have gpsca ... i guess i got that order right
there seems to be one in the repo...the gspca-source...
